name: Niya-Atha Warrior
description: The Niya-Atha Warrior is a medium-sized fey creature wearing chain mail, known for its agility and combat prowess. It can magically enlarge itself, enhancing its physical attributes and combat abilities.
memorable: Its ability to enlarge itself and retain mobility makes it a unique and unpredictable battlefield presence.
goals: To engage in combat with versatility, adapting its size to suit the tactical needs of the moment.
relations: Niya-Atha Warriors may work in groups with other fey creatures or serve larger fey entities.
environment: Typically found in enchanted forests or areas rich in fey magic.
strengths: High dexterity allows effective evasion and skilled attacks in combat.
weaknesses: Limited use of its jumping abilities when enlarged and needs sufficient space for its Enlarge ability to take effect.
attacks: Can perform two attacks with a mace or longbow, varying in damage based on its size.
most_powerful_ability: The Enlarge ability, allowing a significant increase in damage output and enhanced physical performance.
equipment: Chain mail armor and a mace or longbow.
senses: It has a passive perception score of 10, indicating average awareness.
skills: Proficient in Dexterity saving throws (+5), allowing it to avoid many types of attacks.
additional_information: Possesses the ability Reduce to return to normal size effortlessly.
Standing Leap ability enhances jumping capabilities significantly.
Wields a mace for melee attacks and a longbow for ranged combat.
Creates tactical choices in combat with its enlargement skills.
Engages in agile combat, evading attacks while dealing damage.
test_queries: warrior capable of agile combat and leaping
enlarging fey fighter with a mace and bow
lawful neutral agile creature in enchanted forests
